name: js-data-http
description: HTTP (XHR) adapter for js-data in the browser.
author: js-data-http project authors

scripts.bundle_http: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd -o dist/js-data-http.js -m dist/js-data-http.js.map src/index.js
scripts.bundle_fetch: rollup -c fetch/rollup.config.js -f umd -o fetch/dist/js-data-fetch.js -m fetch/dist/js-data-fetch.js.map src/index.js
scripts.bundle_node: rollup -c node/rollup.config.js -f cjs -o node/dist/js-data-http-node.js -m node/dist/js-data-http-node.js.map src/index.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle_http && npm run bundle_fetch && npm run bundle_node && npm run version
scripts.gzip: echo js-data-http gzipped size: $(cat dist/js-data-http.min.js | gzip -f9 | wc -c)kb
scripts.gzip_fetch: echo js-data-fetch gzipped size: $(cat fetch/dist/js-data-fetch.min.js | gzip -f9 | wc -c)kb
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle && npm run min && npm run min_fetch && npm run banner
scripts.cover: istanbul cover -x node/dist/js-data-http-node-tests.js --hook-run-in-context node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 20000 -R dot node/mocha.start.js test/*.test.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run karma && npm run karma_fetch && npm run cover
scripts.release: npm test && npm run doc && repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
